```js
var win = $(window),
    page = $("html,body"),
    wrapper = page.find("div.wrapper"),
    article = page.find("article"),
    fixedEl = page.find("aside"),
    sections = page.find("section"),
    initialPos = fixedEl.offset(),
    width = fixedEl.width(),
    percentWidth = 100 * width / wrapper.width();
```
